subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: Programme to support capacity to mainstream DRR in various arenas of Government and to build UN support to Governments for same. Emphasis on Physical planning, policy and communities empowerment.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: DRR Disaster Risk Reduction
